definitions.definition: Connection or association ; the condition of being related .
The links between the x-values and y-values of ordered pairs of numbers especially coordinates.
Kinship ; being related by blood or marriage .

examples: They have been in a relationship for ten years, but have never married.

definitions.definition: A way in which two or more people behave and are involved with each other
examples: I have a good working relationship with my boss.

definitions.definition: The level or degree of affinity between keys , chords and tones .

main_definition: Connection or association ; the condition of being related .
secondary_definitions: ( mathematics ) The links between the x-values and y-values of ordered pairs of numbers especially coordinates.
Kinship ; being related by blood or marriage .
A way in which two or more people behave and are involved with each other
( music ) The level or degree of affinity between keys , chords and tones .
